treatment_regimens.description: A list of all treatment regimens mentioned in the study. Include every treatment or combination (e.g., monotherapy, combination therapy) exactly as referenced in the document.

countries.description: A list of all countries where the study was conducted. This should capture every geographical location related to patient enrollment or research sites mentioned in the document.

populations.description: A list of population groups with their specific clinical characteristics. Each entry should comprehensively capture details for a subgroup of patients.

stage, histology.description: Combined disease stage and histology information, including details like the progression stage (e.g., Stage III/IV) and histological classification (e.g., NSCLC, NSCC) as provided in the document.

pdl1_status.description: PD-L1 expression status (e.g., 'Mixed', 'PD-L1 negative', 'â‰¥50%'). Capture the value exactly as presented in the study.

n.description: The size of the population group (number of patients or subjects). Ensure the numeric value is extracted accurately
